scripts.docs:publish: npm run docs:clean && npm run docs:build  && cd _book && ECHO joshuamccall.com  > CNAME && git init && git commit --allow-empty -m 'Update docs and examples' && git checkout -b gh-pages && touch .nojekyll && git add . && git commit -am 'Update docs and examples' && git push https://github.com/joshmccall221/gitbook.git gh-pages --force
